alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 2:32PM MDT until August 07 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Banner County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... East central Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 315 PM MDT. * At 231 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Albin, or 32 miles northwest of Kimball, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Albin and Harrisburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
